entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Cold Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:03 AM MST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -13.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Cold Lake 03:00 AM MST Friday 30 December 2022
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -13.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 12.9 km

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 02:38 AM MST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 02:38 AM MST Friday 30 December 2022
